ygData.subject: Re: Fellow gladiator fans, get paid for surfing the web!
ygData.msgSnippet: It was not solicitation. I was giving you guys an opportunity to make some money. I figured gladiator fans would be cool people who spent quite a bit of time
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 55
Message-ID: <17248.55.140.959279670@...>
Date: Fri, 05 Nov 1999 18:36:10 CST
From: "Muaz Abudiab" <dimento@...
Subject: Re: Fellow gladiator fans, get paid for surfing the web!

It was not "solicitation." I was giving you guys an opportunity to make some 
money. I figured gladiator fans would be cool people who spent quite a bit 
of time online...Apparently, I was being to idealistic. I've only posted 
twice on this mailing list; and both times with good intentions. Seeing as 
how last month i made $20 and one of my friends almost $50, I assumed 
(mistakingly) you guys would appreciate my attempt at keeping you guys 
informed. I am most definitely not soliciting (and if you don't believe me 
go to http://www.alladvantage.com and just read what it says, you don't have 
to join, just read what it says). Finally, where do you go off threatening 
me? "Not so much 'please' as 'or else'..." Or else what?

>From: maxim@... (Ape)
>Reply-To: gladiator@onelist.com
>To: gladiator@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [gladiator] Fellow gladiator fans, get paid for surfing the 
>web!
>Date: Fri, 5 Nov 1999 00:14:40 -0500
>
>No more solicitation please....well...not so much 'please' as 'or else'.
